title: ArAindu pArAi
sahitya:
ArAindu pArAi nI anbu manamE nidam arivAna jyOti aduvE


anupallavi

  pArAlayattinilE paritiyena viLaiyADum parivAna param shuDaraip-parishuddha uLLattAl


caraNam    uruvAgip-parAshakti uruvAgi guruvAgi ArvamuDanE kUvum aDiyrin arugAgi
karuNai sheyum kaDalAgi uDalAgi uyirAgi gatiyAgi parama sukhanidhiyAna poruLai nI
